title: Hillary Clinton Reportedly ‘Devastated’ By Benghazi Attack But Is New Demeanor A Crucial Play To ...
text: As of now, Hillary Clinton is ahead in the polls to win the Democratic nomination for the 2016 Presidency. However, her lead is slowly and surely diminishing due to her indecisiveness pertaining to certain situations liberals are passionate about. Ergo, Bernie Sanders – the U.S. senator out of Vermont – has been nipping at Clinton’s...
